# Output Report: Multimodal UI/UX Analysis

**Input Source:** Screenshot of a "Multi-Step E-commerce Checkout Form" (File: input_checkout_form.png)

## 1. Generated HTML & CSS Code

**NOTE:** This code was generated by the Multimodal system (GPT-4o) using the input image, proving the system's ability to translate visuals to working code.

### HTML Structure (Clean, Semantic)
```html
<section class="checkout-form-container">
    <h2>Step 2 of 3: Shipping Details</h2>
    <form id="shipping-form">
        <div class="form-group">
            <label for="address">Shipping Address</label>
            <input type="text" id="address" required>
        </div>
        <button type="submit" class="btn-primary">Continue to Payment</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn-secondary">Go Back</button>
    </form>
</section>
